name: Operation Foxtrot
description:
Welcome To Operation Foxtrot!

This is my first game I've uploaded and it's still a very early build so expect some bugs or wacky mechanics. But please enjoy and let me know how I can improve it, any help is appreciated!

In Operation Foxtrot, you play as one of 5 (technically 4 right now) agents that form an elite group known as Alpha-Squad. You are deployed in to prevent an army of unknown origins composed of drones and soldiers that are on a mission to wipe each of you out and gain control of the metropolis.

Currently there is only an endless, wave-type mode but in the future I hope to add a campaign, character progression, skins, new types of enemies and much more, but for now please enjoy what I've come up with so far!

My work so far:
